objectives: Students will discuss hobbies and free time using Informal/Conversational register language
Students will engage with Action/Adventure themed scenarios related to hobbies and free time
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of informal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining hobbies and free time content with Action/Adventure narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore hobbies and free time through a Action/Adventure lens using Informal/Conversational language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a high-stakes action sequence involving hobbies and free time

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice informal register vocabulary related to hobbies and free time in a action context
Students engage in action themed role-play about hobbies and free time using informal register
Students create original action themed content about hobbies and free time in informal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe hobbies and free time in a Action/Adventure scenario?
What chase or pursuit might be involved in hobbies and free time?
Can you create a Action/Adventure story about hobbies and free time?
How does hobbies and free time change when viewed through a Action/Adventure perspective?
What informal register expressions would you use to discuss this action scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Action/Adventure situation involving hobbies and free time
roles: Character A: Using informal register in action context
Character B: Responding in informal register within action theme

topic_genre_blend: hobbies and free time with chase
hobbies and free time with pursuit
hobbies and free time with danger

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Informal/Conversational throughout: Friendly, relaxed everyday speech
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Action/Adventure theme: High energy, excitement, physical challenges

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Informal/Conversational register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Action/Adventure themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of informal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
